content: yarn 256 meters 280 yards of fingering weight sock yarn such as tukuwool sock 80% wool 20 % nylon 160 m 175 yards per 50 g shown in colorway h28 ujo needles 2 0 mm us 0 for the ribbing 2 5mm us 1 ½ for the main fabric you can use either dpns or a circular needle if you prefer knitting with the magic loop method gauge 32 sts x 37 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 in stockinette st on larger needles always choose a needle size that gets you the right gauge size women s medium 20 cm 8 inch foot circumference length adjustable i wanted to knit woolen socks that could be described as girl s every day essentials the kind of easy going kind of minimalistic socks that fit in your winter boots but still look chic if you need to take your shoes off inside a mixture of traditional ribbed socks with stripes of girly lace that is easy enough for the beginners the lace pattern continues all the way down the heels and toes giving the socks a modern twist these are the kind of socks that work for every occasion from snowy walks to sofa hangs at cozy coffee shops from the first cold days of early fall all the way through to spring the socks are knitted top down from cuff to toes the lace pattern continues all the way down the heel flap and on the instep down to the tip of the toes the socks have short row heels
